Tired of boring website fonts?

Fontonic lets you take control with a single click!  Change any website's fonts to match your style using the fonts you already have.

Choose from all font types: serif, sans-serif, and monospace.  Customize everything or just a few, the power is yours! ï¸

See your changes instantly with a single click on "Apply Selection." âœ¨ 
And best of all, your preferences stick around even after you close the tab! âœ…

Don't like your changes? No problem! Simply hit "Restore" to go back to the original fonts. âª

I'd love to hear from you! Share your feature requests in the reviews.

View source code: https://github.com/amkhrjee/fontonic
